Info.Name: Lan Nguyen
Info.Description: As a Front-end Developer, my objective is to work in a professional workplace, to improve my skills and knowledge in web and app development. I aim to continuously learn and grow as a Full-stack developer, staying up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies.

About.Title: About Me
About.Description: I am a Front-end web/app developer with a passion for creating interactive and responsive applications. I have experience working with JavaScript, Typescript, React, React native, Redux, Node js, HTML, CSS, and Git. I am a quick learner and I am always looking to expand my knowledge and skill set. I am a team player and I am excited to work with others to create amazing applications.
About.Uni: HaNoi University of Science and Technology
